Like many feature laden cameras, if you really want to understand it, you need to invest time to read and understand the manual - a somewhat formidible task, but unavoidable.Within the past year I have purchased this camera, a Samsung HD TV and a Samsung DVD player. They all work very nicely together. I have found the Samsung brand to be excellent!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera Great Price
Reviews.Author: Steven E. Hodges
Reviews.Content: This camera produces exceptional quality photos and is extremely easy to use. For the price, it is a great buy. Everyone I've shown the zoom feature has been very impressed. I would highly recommend this camera. Samsung produces quality products.

Reviews.Title: snap happy!
Reviews.Author: K. Kayson
Reviews.Content: We needed a new camera to replace our old 5.1 mp and 3x's optical zoom.  I wanted one with more zoom, at a reasonalble price, and I am extremely pleased with this one!

Reviews.Title: Takes nice pics but.....
Reviews.Author: S. Raddatz
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera simply because of past experiences with Samsung and the price point.  The camera is beautiful but the rechargeable battery option is a pain in the butt.  If you like to follow your kids around throughout the day or use it for 50 pics throughout the day...you will need to recharge the battery before the day is done.  The PHD (push here dummy) button is not in the typical place, so it makes taking pics a little awkward because you are reaching past the button you would typically use and when you do hit the right button, it doesn't take pics consistently causing you to lose shots, it has to be some sort of timing/focusing thing.  The menus are intense and probably do a lot for you but I don't have time to read it all.  Standard pic files are over 3Mb.  I returned my camera within a week and I am still using the A560 that I have had for a year or so.

Reviews.Title: Poor Image quality
Reviews.Author: Anton Nichta "ton"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for the supposedly impressive wide angle lens. After making several test shots at the highest resolution and lowest compression mode, I was not impressed! The lens has barrel distortion in 24mm, but that is to be expected in a wide angle. What really turned me off was the fuzzy focus of the lens, more so on the left side of the frame than the right. The center was sharp and clear. Zooming higher, the image was respectable. At 24mm ough!That was enough for me to return the camera without exploring any other features on the device.Maybe I received a bad camera, but I was afraid to purchase a replacement, fearing the same result.

Reviews.Title: greatly disappointed
Reviews.Author: Mymumu
Reviews.Content: Very shortly after I got the camera, a bright white vertical line appeared on the monitor. I have no idea how it came to be like this. I called the customer service and they told me it was quite normal for any digital products to have some problems. They even didn't apologize!

Reviews.Title: A ruined vacation
Reviews.Author: D. C. Morton
Reviews.Content: I purchased the HZ15W as a gift for my wife. After owning the camera for a little over a month, during which time it was used sparingly because of time constraints, it was taken, last week, for a visit to the kids and grandkids. Our grand daughter was appearing in her first play (Oklahoma) and we wanted to get many shots of her performance. The camera quit cold. It would turn on for about three seconds, go beep-beep-beep and quit! My wife got no pictures of the play or any other activity. She is livid. An hour spent with the tech rep yielded no results. Amazon said it had been more than 30 days so, "Sorry Charlie." A ludicrous policy if there ever was one. If Amazon sells it, they should stand behind it. It should be their problem to rectify, not mine. Time spent on the phone with Samsung and then having to box the thing up and send it for "repairs" has left a bad taste. If I cancel the order I will only get back a partial refund. That stinks. Now I must wait for the "repaired" camera to return. Will it go on the blink again? Then what? Back again for repairs? No way. Amazon and I will have a very serious discussion. They should have sent a new camera, no questions asked. If Craftsman can do it, so can they. Very, very bad policy. Actually stupid!

Reviews.Title: Too big for my taste, but not a bad camera
Reviews.Author: Evan Jacobs
Reviews.Content: This is a nice camera and very easy to use.  I really enjoy the very large screen.  What I'm not so in love with is how big the camera is overall.  It's too big for a pocket camera (in my opinion) and the picture quality isn't up to a standard that I would deem acceptable as a replacement for an SLR.  If you're looking for something in between those extremes, then this could be an option for you.  The wide lens is very nice and 12 megapixels is plenty of resolution for most anyone.

Reviews.Title: MY HOPES WERE A LITTLE HIGHER
Reviews.Author: Aldenone
Reviews.Content: I thought the Samsung hz15w / wb550 was going to be the one for me this year, but they have restricted recording times, if the 60 bucks is an issue and video recording is not a big deal AND you want manual exposure control then get the Samsung. . . . BUT for video the Panasonic ZS3 / TZ7 rules!!! This is the point and shoot to get if you want the highest zoom, great io features, in BOTH still and moving pictures! Wide angle lens and video compression that will allow you to record video until the memory is full!! It will change settings to allow for the best video, changing for low light, indoors, outdoors . .manually or automatically!! A true HD camcorder and digicam in one.  Just Add video LED and manual exposure control and we would be looking at 6 stars!

Reviews.Title: Specs don't make something good!
Reviews.Author: s0nspark
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife for her birthday to replace an older, cheaper digital camera and it simply does not take good pictures.  The pictures are routinely out of focus, the colors are a mess.  VERY disappointing...This was out first and will be our last Samsung camera for sure.

Reviews.Title: Good camera, pricing?????
Reviews.Author: Greg H. Banzhaf "Banjo"
Reviews.Content: I was going to order this camera, but the price kept dropping, down to $219.95. I was ready to order, but by the time I got home, it went up in price! It kept going up and now is at $269.95, in a little more than an week. No way. This needs some explaining. Down $50 and back up $50 within two weeks. What's up?
